data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Freebox router.
data_description.port: The port number used to access your Freebox router (default is 80).

link.title: Link Freebox Router
link.description:
Select **Submit**, then touch the right arrow on your Freebox router to register it with Home Assistant.

![Location of button on the router](/static/images/config_freebox.png)

error.register_failed: Failed to register, please try again
